description: This is a React component named EventModal that provides a modal form interface for creating or editing events. It includes form validation, state management, and handles user input for event details like title, description, date, time, location, and category.

methods.name: EventModal({ open, onClose, onSubmit, defaultValues })
methods.description: React functional component that renders a modal form for event creation, managing form state, validation, and submission logic.
